= GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 1267663 | website = | footnotes = | name = }} Worthing is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is in Lincoln County, about ten miles south of Sioux Falls. It became a city in 1879, and 927 people lived there at the 2020 census. Since 2010, Worthing has been the home of the LifeLight Music Festival, the largest free music festival in the world. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Worthing website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1879 establishments in Dakota Territory
